bbp: Allows calculation of specific hexadecimal digits of pi without computing previous digits
borwein: Family of iterative algorithms with high-order convergence for pi calculation
buffon: Probability-based method using needle drops to estimate pi
chudnovsky_fast: Extremely fast algorithm used to compute trillions of pi digits
pi_coprimes: Uses probability of two random integers being coprime to estimate pi
euler: Mathematical identity connecting pi with exponential and trigonometric functions
euler_kahan: Numerical integration technique for pi approximation
gauss_legendre: Iterative method that doubles correct digits each iteration
monte_carlo: Uses random sampling and probability to estimate pi
nilakantha: Faster-converging Indian mathematical series for pi
ramanujan_fast: Highly efficient infinite series discovered by Srinivasa Ramanujan
